name: Success
what_you_do: The Soulpreneur Success Code empowers healers and heart-centered soulpreneurs to transform their relationship with sales, guiding them to create authentic success in their businesses through coaching and resources.
who_you_serve: They serve healers and heart-centered entrepreneurs looking to grow their businesses and make a unique difference in the world.
bio: Ann Hession has over 30 years of experience as a medical intuitive and energy healer, and has sold millions in heart-based sales conversations.
business_focus: The Soulpreneur Success Code empowers healers and heart-centered soulpreneurs to transform their relationship with sales, guiding them to create authentic success in their businesses through coaching and resources. (heart-centered sales)
